CustomField.formula:
IF (AND (NOT (ISBLANK( requested_trial_start_date__c )), ISBLANK( activated_date__c ), requested_trial_start_date__c <= TODAY()), "Request raised" ,
IF( AND (NOT (ISBLANK( requested_trial_start_date__c )), NOT (ISBLANK( activated_date__c )),ISBLANK( deactivated_date__c ), activated_date__c <= TODAY(), requested_trial_end_date__c > TODAY()), "Active Trial" ,
IF( AND (NOT (ISBLANK( requested_trial_start_date__c )), NOT (ISBLANK( activated_date__c )),NOT(ISBLANK( deactivated_date__c )), deactivated_date__c <= TODAY()), "Trial Terminated" ,
IF( AND (NOT (ISBLANK( requested_trial_start_date__c )), NOT (ISBLANK( activated_date__c )),ISBLANK( deactivated_date__c ), requested_trial_end_date__c <= TODAY()), "Trail Overdue" ,
NULL
))))
CustomField.label: Trial Status
